name: Who Near
overview:
Who Near is the easiest and fun way to share where and what are you doing.

Who Near is a social location-based application which enables you to share where and what are you doing with your friends or nearby people, furthermore people can easily understand your mood with Who Near act badges.

Share what are you doing on “Space” then your friends or people nearby can see your message on “Space”. You can use Space to learn more about your location or just share your thoughts with people.

Write, post, chat, share, meet, enjoy etc. do whatever you want with Who Near. Who Near gives you a lot of options to choose. If you just want to share your location just share, only want to ask something use Space for it, use our act badges to share with people what you are doing or do nothing just look around what people are saying and doing at the same time. How you can use Who Near ?

  • Know who are at campus and what they’re doing right now.

  • I’ve just arrived in Italy, “What is the best place to have a pleasant dinner? ”, let’s try to find answers from Who Near.

  • I’m going to Vienna next week, but I have no idea about the city. So , I asked people who have been there before using Who Near.

  • I’ve been sitting at home for ages, none of my friends are available right now, from Who Near I can chat with people whom I don’t even know and have a good time.

  • We meet outside with my colleagues, but I’m terrible about giving directions about places, it was easy for me to send location using Who Near.

offices.address2: Vadi Yurtlari A Blk. K.1 D.6
